channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 12:38 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 12:38 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 12:27 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community

item.title: 🟠 11:16 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 11:16 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
